Lush LaviÃ© is an online women's lingerie and loungewear boutique located in the Midwest. Founded in 2018 by a woman who decided to stop fantasizing and to live her fantasies instead. 

We specialize in lingerie and loungewear that women would typically wear when they're fantasizing about their significant other.
